content: Fuban can also slowly pull one of its claws back to then sweep upward in front of his face, which can damage you if you aren’t paying attention. If you’re worried about getting hit, you can also  it safe and stick with the Thrust Stance to hit its claws with a long range heavy attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Fuban Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Fuban can also slowly pull one of its claws back to then sweep upward in front of his face, which can damage you if you aren’t paying attention. If you’re worried about getting hit, you can also  it safe and stick with the Thrust Stance to hit its claws with a long range heavy attack.
